author: Staff Reporter
text:
Stating that establishing mobile tower for a private telecom company in their village would affect the humans and cattle, villagers threatened to boycott the elections if the work is not stopped.

Villagers of Perumal Kovil Street in Sellappampatti panchayat said that work is on to establish a mobile tower in land belonging to Rajendran.

“Since the tower would affect the cattle and villagers, we had submitted many petitions to the district administration,” they added.

The administration had halted the works temporarily.

However, erection of tower work began again. “If they continue with the work, we will boycott the elections,” they added.
title: Villagers protest against erecting mobile tower
